pr_title: [somfytahoma] Added support for the thermostatic valve

timeline.message:
[somfytahoma] Added support for the thermostatic valve

Signed-off-by: Ondrej Pecta <opecta@gmail.com>

[somfytahoma] added channel for controlling the gate position

Signed-off-by: Ondrej Pecta <opecta@gmail.com>

[somfytahoma] enabled changing of pod lighting led intensity

Signed-off-by: Ondrej Pecta <opecta@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: If this has only open and closed, you could make it Contact, which has exactly these states.
timeline.author: fwolter
timeline.diffHunk:

 		<description>The level of the heating</description>
 		<state max="100" min="0" step="1" pattern="%d %%"/>

+	<channel-type id="current_heating_mode">

+	<channel-type id="open_closed_valve">
